Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 D0 spells/May cast chosen D1 spell 1/long rest
Balm Of Peace: May use Channel Divinity to move 30' w/out provoking an OA, restoring 2d6+4 HP to each target w/in 5'
Divine Intervention: 100% chance to gain help from deity 1/wk
Elemental Adept (Acid): Acid spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Lightning spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Embodiment Of The Law: May cast enchantment spells as a bonus action 4/long rest
Emboldening Bond: R30' May give 6 willing targets +1d4 on an attack, ability, or saving throw 1/rd when w/in 30' of each other for 10 min 6/long rest
Expansive Bond: Protective Bond works at 60' and gives resistance to damage
Harness Divine Power: May use Channel Divinity to regain a spell slot up to level 3 3/long rest
Order's Demand: R30' May use Channel Divinity to charm targets (DC 18 Wisdom neg; damage ends) for 1 rd
Potent Spellcasting: +4 Cleric cantrip damage
Protective Bond: Emboldening Bond member may use Reaction to teleport 30' and take another's damage
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Twilight Sanctuary: May use Channel Divinity to create a 30' radius for 1 min that gives targets choice of 1d6+20 temporary HP or end to charmed or frightened
Twilight Shroud: Twilight Sanctuary gives half cover
Voice Of Authority: Ally self spell target may use Reaction to make an attack
